other_tests.findings: Fasting glucose of 109 mg/dl, 1-h glucose of 220 mg/dl, and 2-h glucose of 186 mg/dl.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Insulin was begun at 22 weeks gestation, and thereafter, the majority of her pre- and postmeal glucose levels met therapeutic targets.

other_tests.date: At least annually after the index pregnancy
other_tests.changes_over_time: If A1C rises, monitoring should continue at least annually, and efforts to halt progression should be intensified.
